Translations.Text: As por those kred plumb righteous life ni admit them gxarden flu streams wherein ili viv forever Such est truthful promes DI. Whose utterances est truthful than di
Gxi est en accordance kun your wishes wishes popol scripture anyone commits evil pag por gxi ne hav helper supporter DI
As por those plumb righteous life vir female while kred ili enter Paradise; slightest injustice
Who est put direkt his religi than unu submits totally DI plumb righteous life creed de Abraham monotheism? DI chosen Abraham beloved AMIK
Al DI aparten cxio heavens ter! DI est PLEN control all AJX

Ili konsult vi koncern women dir DI enlightens vi them as recited por vi scripture! Vi restore dekstr orf girls vi cheat their due dowries when vi wish marry them vi ne sorb avantagx da them. Dekstr orf knab ankaux protekt ankaux. Vi trakt orf equitably. Whatever bon vi do DI est fully aware thereof
